title: Happy Halloween!
detail_text: <:th_ch0000/>Happy Halloweeeen~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>AHHHHH!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Wow! Your costume was extremely effective in delighting her~ 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Mari!? Nico wasn’t delighted there!! Nico was scared!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Hey, Mari understands how you truly feel even if you don’t want to say it out loud, Nicocchi 𝅘𝅥𝅮 Today is Halloween, don’t be afraid to be flashy~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You didn’t even bother to comprehend what Nico said!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Here, Nicocchi, take this.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Huh? What is this...... a headband?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Ayumu and Nozomi made one for everyone. Nicocchi’s is special! It’s a black veil headband~ Look, it’s a voluminous yet delicate veil!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>......This flashy headband totally suits the number one idol in the universe, Nico! Let’s go where everyone else is, Mari!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
